name: Peanutty Sauerkraut Coleslaw
author: TicklingYourTastebuds
summary: This sweet, nutty coleslaw made from traditional German sauerkraut is rich and creamy. It's so simple to make yet truly addictive!
ingredients: 3 cups sauerkraut, drained, rinsed and squeezed dry
directions: Toast the wheat germ in a skillet over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, until browned and fragrant, about 5 minutes
Pour wheat germ onto a plate, and set aside to cool
Place yogurt, peanut butter, and sugar into a blender, and blend until smooth
Toss sauerkraut with peanut dressing; refrigerate for 30 minutes to allow the flavors to blend
Toss with toasted wheat germ just before serving
